item.title: The Last Run
item.description: So, I finally completed my HSC, hopefully I will pass a with a good marks with my friends. I always thought that finishing HSC will be a blast and enjoyable, but everything feels so vague. ACS classes are long & tiresome to do, but I got no other option at this moment. The last time I felt these vagueness and identity crisis was not good. I was rejected, rejected in my dream college while my friends got accepted.

item.title: Message For Future For someone
item.description: Encrypted message for someone which might go live after few months The Message Don’t click the link, it’s not for you. Why post it here? I got reasons. Now Shoo.

item.title: My first POST!
item.description: So you clicked in the link huh? Curious? I got nothing at this moment. Here is a JOKE for you
